title: tiruvaEragam urai guruparanai
sahitya:
tiruvEragam urai guruparanaip-paNi manamE sharaNam uruvOrai aravaNaittaruLum


anupallavi

  piravAp-perum pEru perak-krpai kUravum paramAnandam ura paripAlittiDavum


caraNam    paramEshap-perumAn paravashamumurumAru guruvAi upadEsham purinda kumarEshan
sirai vAsamirundu sIrellAm izhanda surar nirai vAzhvai perum aruL purinda
